September.body: Feathers in the breeze, Chicken Boy stands tall and proud, Rooster of the streets.
Blueberry delight, Frozen treat on a hot day, Summer's sweetest bite.
Steel giants so high, Reaching for the endless sky, Urban dreams touch stars.
Creatures roam and play, In nature's grand ballet, Wildlife's wondrous display.
Melted cheese so fine, On a doughy crust divine, Pizza love's design.
Pages come alive, Worlds within the written word, Imagination thrives.
Cured and savory, Salami's flavor so bold, Charcuterie gold.
Symbol of connection, Binding words with affection, & is perfection.
Soft and cuddly friend, Teddy bear, love without end, Comfort they extend.
Minds together blend, Ideas shared, new paths to tend, Innovation's trend.
Flags at half-mast sway, In memory we convey, Heroes of that day.
Chocolate swirls in cream, Milkshake, a childhood dream, Sweet delight supreme.
Guidance and embrace, Grandparents' love leaves its trace, Warmth and wisdom's grace.
Colors, forms, and sound, Creativity unbound, Inventive hearts abound.
Felt hat on the head, Vintage style, old-world thread, Fashion finely bred.
Mashed green and bright, Guacamole's pure delight, Dip into the light.
Freedom's cornerstone, Constitution's truth is known, Rights we call our own.
Juicy patty seared, Cheese and toppings, flavors cheered, Burger love revered.

September.day: National Talk Like a Pirate Day
September.body: Arr, matey, they say, Pirates speak in their own way, Seafaring display.
Pepperoni's zest, Pizza's classic, loved the best, Slices of pure fest.
Flags of every hue, Peace for me and peace for you, World's dreams coming true.
Gentle giants roam, In the wild they find their home, Elephants, we own.

September.day: National Great American Pot Pie Day
September.body: Flaky crust conceals, Savory fillings, warm appeals, Pot pie's comfort heals.
Periods, commas, dash, Punctuation's rhythmic flash, Grammar's art, a splash.
Ink and paper dance, Heroes rise, villains advance, Comic worlds entrance.
Golden, fluffy stacks, Syrup rivers down their backs, Morning joy, no lack.
Aluminum's clang, Recycle and reduce's the plan, Earth's future in hand.
Amber liquid gold, Cheers to friends and stories told, Beer's warmth, untold.
Brewed to start the day, Coffee's warmth in every way, Caffeine's rich ballet.
Spices warm and wide, Cider simmered by fireside, Autumn's sip with pride.
